sentences: Good practice guidance on LULUCF: Contact group Co-Chair Audun Rosland (Norway) introduced the draft conclusions (FCCC/SBSTA/2003/L.3), which the SBSTA adopted without amendment.

The conclusions take note of the IPCCs work on: good practice guidance on LULUCF; definitions on degradation and devegetation; and the factoring out of natural and indirect human effects on carbon stock change.

In the conclusions, SBSTA requests the Secretariat to prepare a paper on draft common reporting formats and decides to continue consideration of issues relating to harvested wood products at SBSTA-19.
